attributes.action: increase the penalty for not wearing a seat belt to £60 and three points
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the enforcement of not wearing a seat is a £30 fine - for all.  This penalty is not ensuring people where their seatbelts - if fitted.

Not wearing your seat belt in the front can cause the driver or passenger to be hurled at the windscreen or steering wheel.  Equally, sitting in the back without a seatbelt can cause the passenger to be hurled into the seat of front passengers in some cases causing death.

Persons under 14: Driver to have £60 fine and three points

Persons over 14: Issued with £60 (and three points if in possession of a driving licence).

This, I feel, will help in reducing deaths on the road.
